= Cpp Patterns =

== Factory + Cache ==

{{{
  
  shared_ptr<widget> make_widget(int id)
  {
    static map<int, weak_ptr<widget> > cache;
    static mutex mut_cache;
    lock_guard<mutex> hold(mut_cache);
    shared_ptr<widget> ret = cache[id].lock();
    if(!ret)
      cache[id] = ret = load_widget(id);
    
    return ret;
  }

}}}
